attributes.additional_details: MPs of all parties have treated the Electorate with contempt. They have undermined the very fabric of our democracy. They are, collectively, treacherous and unfit to sit in the House of Commons.
attributes.background: This House of Commons has shown itself to be irresponsible, undemocratic and unfit to sit any longer. The will of the People has been disregarded by Members of all parties. Democracy is under threat from the very people we elect to exercise it.
